descriptionHtml:
This is a patch for those who use Skyre and want to use the Noldor Content Pack with it.

The reprocer doesnt seem to patch the armors or the weapons.
So after a quik fix in the creation kit i made me own patch.

[b][i][u]DISCLAIMER[/u][/i][/b]

As of 1.2 the Bows are fixed and are classed as longbows

[u][i][b] REQUIREMENTS[/b]
[/i]
Noldor Content Pack by Maty743[/u] - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58656/?
The Hotfix 2 that comes with the mod.

[i][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/i]

[i]WITH MANAGER:[/i]
Download the file and activate it.

[i]WITH OUT THE MANAGER[/i]
download manually and copy it to the skyrim data folder.

[u][i]CREDITS
[/i][/u]
All items are used from the  Noldor Content Pack mod by [u]Maty743
[/u]I used the Longbow script for the bows from T3nd0s Skyrim Redone by [b]T3nd0[/b]
author: Mrbiatchface
